# wholeSymbol

**Instance Property**

An effect requesting an animation that pulses all layers simultaneously.

## Declaration

```swift
var wholeSymbol: PulseSymbolEffect { get }
```

## Determining effect scope

- **byLayer**: An effect requesting an animation that pulses only the layers marked to always pulse.
